title: 4 shot in west Montgomery
content:
MONTGOMERY, AL (WSFA) -
Four people were injured in a shooting in west Montgomery Friday night, according to Capt. Zedrick Dean with the Montgomery Police Department.
Authorities were called to the 1300 block of Clay Street around 9:10 p.m.
Four adult victims were transported to a Montgomery hospital for treatment of gunshot wounds.
According to police, one victim suffered serious injuries, and the other three suffered non-life-threatening injuries.
No arrests have been made.
